title: Ep 146 | Jase's Road Trip with the In-Laws, Al's Preacher Smack-Talk, and Going Public for Jesus
description:
Jase and his in-laws take a six-hour road trip without Missy. Jase uses a UFO story to share the gospel with a young audience. Si claims he's "5 for 3" as teal season opens. Phil cracks his sons up by explaining a key difference between 50 and 74. Al is the king of trash talk when he's preaching. And the guys answer a question about going public for Jesus, coming under attack, and how you know you're wearing the armor of God.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
